utils.options

Class OptionsArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.options.OptionsArray

  • public class OptionsArray
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to make an array of options that can manipulate all the options of a message. This class is also used to generate all the option portion of a message.
